column1: bernice m. may| funeral service for ms. bernice m. way of atlanta
column2: ga. will be held on tuesday june 23
column3: 2015 at 12 p. m. at deliverance straightway holiness church 613 clifton road se atlanta
column4: ga. 30316 with pastor janet carthon. interment at kennedy memorial gardens. ms. way remains will lie in state from 11:00 a. m. until hour of service. visitation today from 12:00-8:00 p. m. ms. way is survived by (6) children
column8: and her loving sister. gregory b. levett & sons funeral home inc. avondale-scottdale chapel 351 n. clarendon ave. scottdale
